Events.Event_Name: HCTUptakeAtDebut: state 0 (decision, sigmoid by year and sex)
HCTUptakePostDebut: state 2 (From LTFU or ART dropout back into HCT uptake loop)
TestingOnSymptomatic: state 0 (willing to enroll in ART?)
TestingOnANC: state 0 (willing to enroll in ART and healthcare accessible?)
ARTStaging: state 1 (random choice: linking from positive diagnostic test)
ARTStaging: state 2 (Muxer to make sure only one entry per DT)
ARTStaging: state 4 (check eligibility for ART, CD4 agnostic)

Actual_IndividualIntervention_Config.NOTE1: Threshold for adult vs child guidelines

Events.Event_Name: ARTStaging: state 5 (random choice: Return for CD4 or LTFU)
ARTStaging: state 6 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)
OnPreART: state 1 (random choice: pre-ART or LTFU)
OnPreART: state 2 (check eligibility for ART, CD4 agnostic)

Actual_IndividualIntervention_Config.NOTE1: Threshold for adult vs child guidelines

Events.Event_Name: OnPreART: state 4 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)
OnART: state 3 (Willing to re-enroll in ART?)
